item.title: Scandinavian Coffee Cake
item.description: â²ï¸ Prep time: 15 min ğŸ³ Cook time: â‰ˆ 3 hours ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 1 cake Ingredients 1/2 cup milk 1/2 cup shortening 1/2 cup sugar 1/2 teaspoon salt 1 package active dry yeast 1/4 cup warm (not hot) water 3 cup sifted enriched Flour 2 eggs, beaten melted butter, or margarine 2/3 cup firmly packed brown sugar 2 teaspoon cinnamon chopped walnuts Directions Scald milk. Add shortening, sugar, and salt.
